meanings.definition: Substances that do not cause cancer.
meanings.sent1: Noncarcinogens like fruits and vegetables promote good health.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study noncarcinogens to understand their effects on the body.
meanings.sent3: The noncarcinogens in the salad danced happily in my stomach.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bouquet of noncarcinogens, spreading positivity everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The importance of noncarcinogens in our diet cannot be overstated.

meanings.sent1: It is crucial to choose noncarcinogens when selecting cleaning products.
meanings.sent2: The noncarcinogens ingredients in the sunscreen make it safe for daily use.
meanings.sent3: The noncarcinogens label on the paint can made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as pure and noncarcinogens as a mountain stream.
meanings.sent5: The noncarcinogens nature of the product reassured customers about its safety.
